works.title: Lunchbox Showcase prototype
works.desc: This prototype simulates the process of creating a unique URL for archive purposes. Prospect clients use this to view company's past campaigns. It is fully responsive on all devices.

works.title: Milkbone Pethub Mobile
works.desc: This is a mobile site for a Milkbone holiday promotion campaign. It consists of an email list submission and videos for pet safety.

works.title: Ever After High
works.desc: This is a microsite showcasing new characters for a popular doll collection. It involved video engagement and character profiles.

works.title: Power Rangers
works.desc: This site consisted of a customizable letter maker for children. Also, character profiles with social engagement.

works.title: LG
works.desc: These are animated page headers for Walmart. Constructed with Greensock, CSS3, JQuery, JS.

works.title: Phillips Norelco
works.desc: These are animated page headers for Walmart. Constructed with Greensock, CSS3, JQuery, JS.

works.title: Monster High
works.desc: This project included a compatibility test, video engagement, and character profiles with social.

works.title: Various VW campaigns
works.desc: Web advertising, rich media, and page overlays were some of many campaigns I was involved while employed in TBWAChiatDay.

works.title: Various HTC campaigns
works.desc: While working in Deutsch I was involved in developing home page redesign, Facebook tabs, and web advertising.

works.title: LA Bus Doors Open
works.desc: This is a project I made for users to post and share experiences in LA bus transportation. I used Ruby/Rails with Heroku for data hosting. Viewable on all screen sizes.

works.title: Eat Beans
works.desc: Eat Beans is a health awareness app where users can post and share bean recipes. I used Ruby/Rails with Heroku for data hosting. It is responsive on all screen sizes.

works.title: oh cat
works.desc: This is an employee login app for a taco restaurant where a waiter can log a customer order through a smartphone or tablet device. I used Node.js with Angular on Heroku hosting.

works.title: Various Nissan campaigns
works.desc: Various web advertising such as rich media, banner ads, and mini games were part of many campaigns I programmed.

works.title: TMZ startup and launch
works.desc: Being in charge of the interactive department, I developed and designed video player templates, interactive games, online content, and brand identity.

works.title: Various Zap2it campaigns
works.desc: Working at Zap2it, I handled the design and development of interactive games, ads, and web pages.
